summary: This document is an email from an Information Governance Officer at a UK hospital's Data, Technology & Information Directorate, dated December 8, 2023. The officer is responding to an inquiry, stating they cannot find the recipient's records in their systems and requesting confirmation of attendance at specific hospitals and additional identifying information.

persons.name: Information Governance Officer
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Data, Technology & Information Directorate, who is searching for medical records and requesting additional information from the recipient.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding Medical Records
events.description: An Information Governance Officer emails a recipient stating they cannot find their medical records in their systems and requests confirmation of hospital attendance and additional identifying details.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 8, 2023, from a UK hospital's Information Governance Officer.
The officer states they cannot find the recipient's medical records in their systems.
The officer asks the recipient to confirm if they attended specific hospitals, including the Royal Brompton.
The officer requests additional identifying information such as a correct NHS number or patient ID to assist in the search.
